Properties

| Improve this Doc View Source

Language

The language of the input audio. Supplying the input language in ISO-639-1 format will improve accuracy and latency.

Declaration
[JsonProperty("language", DefaultValueHandling = DefaultValueHandling.Ignore)]
public string Language { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String
| Improve this Doc View Source

Model

The model to use for this request. Currently only Whisper1 is supported.

Declaration
[JsonProperty("model")]
public string Model { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String
| Improve this Doc View Source

Prompt

An optional text to guide the model's style or continue a previous audio segment. The prompt should match the audio language for transcriptions, or English for translations.

Declaration
[JsonProperty("prompt", DefaultValueHandling = DefaultValueHandling.Ignore)]
public string Prompt { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String
| Improve this Doc View Source

ResponseFormat

The format of the transcript output, should be one of the options in AudioRequest.ResponseFormats. See https://platform.openai.com/docs/api-reference/audio/createTranscription#audio-createtranscription-response_format

Declaration
[JsonProperty("response_format", DefaultValueHandling = DefaultValueHandling.Ignore)]
public string ResponseFormat { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String
| Improve this Doc View Source

Temperature

The sampling temperature, between 0 and 1. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic. If set to 0, the model will use log probability to automatically increase the temperature until certain thresholds are hit.

Declaration
[JsonProperty("temperature", DefaultValueHandling = DefaultValueHandling.Ignore)]
public double Temperature { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Double
